title: Lecture 1: Welcome And Setting Up
summary: Course orientation, environment setup, and expectations for AI-supported coding.

title: Lecture 2: Variables And Collections
summary: Core Python syntax, data structures, and essential debugging patterns for research scripts.

title: Lecture 3: Control Flow And File Operations
summary: Control flow design, file handling, and automation techniques for data-driven workflows.

title: Lecture 4: Numerical Computing
summary: NumPy arrays, vectorisation, and numerical best practices for large astronomical datasets.

title: Lecture 5: Functions And Object-Oriented Programming
summary: Function design, modular organisation, and foundations of object-oriented programming.

title: Lecture 6: Data Visualization
summary: Matplotlib workflows, visual diagnostics, and interactive plotting techniques.

title: Lecture 7: LLM API Basics
summary: LLM API authentication, structured prompting, and cost-aware usage patterns.

title: Lecture 8: LLM Function Tools And RAG
summary: Function calling, retrieval-augmented generation, and vector search integrations.

title: Lecture 9: GitHub
summary: Git and GitHub fundamentals, documentation standards, and GitHub Pages publishing.

title: Lecture 10: Streamlit
summary: Streamlit interface design, state management, and deployment of interactive research tools.

title: Lecture 11: Pandas Basics
summary: Pandas DataFrames, catalog operations, and data manipulation for astronomical analysis.

title: Lecture 12: Advanced Pandas
summary: GroupBy operations, merging catalogs, pivot tables, and advanced Pandas transformations.

title: Lecture 13: Astroquery Astropy Units Coordinates
summary: Astroquery database access, Astropy units and coordinates, and catalog cross-matching.

title: Lecture 14: Astropy Time, Observation Planning, FITS
summary: Astropy Time systems, observation planning, visibility calculations, and FITS file handling.

title: Lecture 15: SkyField Ephemerides
summary: SkyField ephemerides, precise planetary positions, and rise/set/transit calculations.

title: Lecture 16: SciPy Interpolation, Differentiation, Integration
summary: SciPy interpolation, differentiation, and integration for astronomical time-series data.

title: Lecture 17: SciPy Random Variables, Measurement Uncertainty
summary: Statistical analysis, measurement uncertainty, random variables, and error propagation.
